tidbits.title: Biodiversity Hotspot
tidbits.description: The islands are a biodiversity hotspot with lush rainforests, diverse flora, and fauna, including endemic species like the São Toméan weaver and the Príncipe kingfisher.

tidbits.title: Colonial History
tidbits.description: Former Portuguese colonies, São Tomé and Príncipe, still bear remnants of colonial architecture and a blend of African and Portuguese cultural influences.

tidbits.title: Chocolate Production
tidbits.description: The country is known for its cocoa production, producing high-quality chocolate, and offering opportunities for agritourism centered around cocoa plantations.
